Summary: Very Large white light blinked on , then shot out of view at an unbelievable speed
divs: Sighting DetailsVery Large white light blinked on , then shot out of view at an unbelievable speed It was twilight (AM) and i had just left the local 24hr supermarket and even though it was over very quickly , it was also observed by staff outside having a cigarette. Not the first time Ive seen something within that half mile area .
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Carmarthen
There were no other sightings in Carmarthen on or around January 28th 2012
